languages.text: {n}Свита медлит. Кто-то обменивается недоуменными взглядами, кто-то, нахмурившись, пристально оглядывает вас, словно надеясь увидеть зримые признаки колдовства.{/n}
{n}Your retinue hesitates. Some exchange puzzled glances, while others frown and look at you intently, as if hoping to see obvious signs of sorcery.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Свита медлит. Кто-то обменивается недоуменными взглядами, кто-то, нахмурившись, пристально оглядывает вас, словно надеясь увидеть зримые признаки колдовства.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Your retinue hesitates. Some exchange puzzled glances, while others frown and look at you intently, as if hoping to see obvious signs of sorcery.{/n}

{n}Your retinue hesitates. Some exchange puzzled glances, while others frown and look at you intently, as if hoping to see obvious signs of sorcery.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你的随行人员犹豫起来。其中一部分人困惑地交换着目光，而另一部分人则皱着眉头，仔细打量着你，似乎在努力搜索明显的巫术痕迹。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your retinue hesitates. Some exchange puzzled glances, while others frown and look at you intently, as if hoping to see obvious signs of sorcery.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你的随行人员犹豫起来。其中一部分人困惑地交换着目光，而另一部分人则皱着眉头，仔细打量着你，似乎在努力搜索明显的巫术痕迹。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los miembros de tu séquito titubean. Algunos intercambian miradas de desconcierto, otros fruncen el ceño y te examinan atentamente como si intentasen detectar algún indicio evidente de brujería.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your retinue hesitates. Some exchange puzzled glances, while others frown and look at you intently, as if hoping to see obvious signs of sorcery.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los miembros de tu séquito titubean. Algunos intercambian miradas de desconcierto, otros fruncen el ceño y te examinan atentamente como si intentasen detectar algún indicio evidente de brujería.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Maiyetin tereddüt ediyor. Bazıları şaşkın bakışlarla birbirine bakarken kalanlar, kaşlarını çatıp sanki sahirliğin bariz işaretlerini görmeyi umuyormuş gibi dikkatle seni inceliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your retinue hesitates. Some exchange puzzled glances, while others frown and look at you intently, as if hoping to see obvious signs of sorcery.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Maiyetin tereddüt ediyor. Bazıları şaşkın bakışlarla birbirine bakarken kalanlar, kaşlarını çatıp sanki sahirliğin bariz işaretlerini görmeyi umuyormuş gibi dikkatle seni inceliyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}従者たちは言葉に詰まる。あるものは困惑した様子で視線を交わし、あるものは、顔をしかめ、魔術の明らかな証拠を見つけようとするかのように、熱心に見る。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your retinue hesitates. Some exchange puzzled glances, while others frown and look at you intently, as if hoping to see obvious signs of sorcery.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}従者たちは言葉に詰まる。あるものは困惑した様子で視線を交わし、あるものは、顔をしかめ、魔術の明らかな証拠を見つけようとするかのように、熱心に見る。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Votre entourage hésite. Si certains se contentent d'échanger des regards perplexes, d'autres froncent ostensiblement les sourcils et vous dévisagent attentivement, comme dans l'espoir de déceler des signes évidents de sorcellerie.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your retinue hesitates. Some exchange puzzled glances, while others frown and look at you intently, as if hoping to see obvious signs of sorcery.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre entourage hésite. Si certains se contentent d'échanger des regards perplexes, d'autres froncent ostensiblement les sourcils et vous dévisagent attentivement, comme dans l'espoir de déceler des signes évidents de sorcellerie.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dein Gefolge zögert. Einige tauschen verwirrte Blicke aus, andere runzeln die Stirn und mustern dich eindringlich, als würden sie hoffen, offensichtliche Anzeichen für Zauberei zu erkennen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your retinue hesitates. Some exchange puzzled glances, while others frown and look at you intently, as if hoping to see obvious signs of sorcery.{/n}
